short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customizations for the Mastodon advanced interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The default Mastodon advanced interface has fixed-width columns. Pachydermatologist allows you to fill the whitespace with evenly spaced columns across the whole page, a larger home column, center the default layout, or customize each column's size to your liking.
